Text: Please relax your wrist and keep it in the most comfortable position.
Movement direction, up/down: The ulnar down turn controls the character to move up, and the ulnar down turn controls the character to move down
Movement orientation, left/right: A left wrist rotation corresponds to the character moving to the left, and a right wrist rotation corresponds to the character moving to the right
Enter aiming state: Perform any action of extension and flexion to enter the item aiming mode
